COVID-19 Prediction Using DNA Sequences

This project involved the prediction of COVID-19 given DNA sequence embeddings. I explored several models including logistic regression, kernel SVM and kernel linear regression but kernel linear regression gave the best score of 93% on Kaggleâ€™s private leaderboard. || || Github ||
